name: Barrage of Bullets
text: Spend any number of bullets to increase the damage this attack deals by 2 for each bullet spent this way.

name: Barrel Roll
text: Draw 3 and then discard 2 cards from your hand.

name: Blinding Fire
text: You may spend 2 bullets to inflict blind.

name: Bombardment
text: You may spend a bullet. If you do, confuse the monster or increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 2.

name: Breath Control
text: Search your discard pile for a Red Diamond and place it on top of your deck.

name: Bullet Surge
text: Blue Diamond + Black Diamond: Spend any number of bullets. If you do, choose a player to draw 1 for each bullet spent this way.

name: Camouflage
text: Stealth.

name: Cannonball
text: You may spend 3 bullets. If you do, stun the monster and increase the damage this attack deals by 4. Another player can generate stamina to help you pay for this card.

name: Cooldown
text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Red Diamond and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Counter Measure
text: Assist. If you avoid attrition damage this turn, search your discard pile for up to 2 cards of your choice and add them to your hand.

name: Cover Fire
text: Assist. When another player would suffer attrition damage, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage.

name: Cycle of Bullets
text: When you discard this card to generate stamina for a Red Diamond, reload 1.

name: Diversion
text: Choose another player to draw 1. You may spend a bullet. If you do, that player draws 2 instead.

name: Exertion
text: Assist. When you discard this card to generate stamina for a Red Diamond, it generates 2 stamina.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Remove 1 struggle. You may spend 2 bullets. If you do, this attack inflicts vulnerable.

name: Fire Cascade
text: Reclaim: Red Diamond, Red Diamond.

name: Gunfire
text: You may spend a bullet to increase the damage this attack deals by 3.

name: Infallible Aim
text: Your weapon gets +3 damage until the end of this turn. If your bullet track level is 3, your weapon gets +5 damage instead.

name: Line of Fire
text: Assist. At the start of your movement phase, if you have 7 cards or more in your hand, you may reveal this card from your hand. If you do, your weapon gets +3 damage until the end of the turn.

name: Long Range
text: The next Red Diamond you play this turn gains stealth. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, prevent any attrition damage you would suffer.

name: Negation
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand and spend a bullet in order to cancel the effects of that card.

name: Not This Time!
text: When you reveal an attrition card, you may reveal this card from your hand and spend a bullet in order to gain a defense token (max: 1 per turn).

name: Pressing Shot
text: Draw 1. If your bullet track level is 1 or higher, draw 2 instead.

name: Prompt Answer
text: When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand to reload 2.

name: Prompt Jump
text: When you would suffer damage, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage.

name: Prompt Reflexes
text: Draw 1.

name: Quick Reload
text: Reload 1.

name: Quick Shot
text: When you discard this card from your hand, reload 1 or deal your base weapon damage.

name: Ranged
text: Assist. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, it counts as a Yellow Diamond in your sequence for the attrition check.

name: Rapid Ignition
text: You may spend a bullet to search your discard pile for a Red Diamond and place it on top of your deck.

name: Ready to Shine!
text: Discard any number of cards from your hand and then draw until you have 3.

name: Recharging
text: Assist. Reload 2.

name: Replenishment
text: At the end of your action phase, reload X where X is the number of bullets you spent this turn.

name: Repositioning
text: Scissors: You may shuffle all Red Diamond from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Strafing
text: Assist. You may spend a bullet to deal 3 damage. If you do, you may immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Strategic Support
text: You may choose a player to discard a Black Diamond from their hand. If they do, you reload 2.

name: Suppressive Fire
text: Assist. Reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play by 1.

name: Swift Deflection
text: When you discard this card from your hand, draw 1.

name: Swift Reload
text: Assist. Reload 1. If you have another Yellow Diamond in your sequence, reload 2 instead.

name: Tactical Reload
text: Reload 3.

name: Target Acquisition
text: Assist. Search your deck for a Black Diamond and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Thunderous Shot
text: Spend any number of bullets. For each bullet spent this way, draw 1 and increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1.

name: Vanguard
text: You may reveal a Blue Diamond from your hand. If you do, draw 2.
